1.details:
Create design specification for:
1. Picture-in-Picture broadcast monitor layout
2. Real-time stats panel (Twitch + YouTube)
3. Quick scene preview component
4. Responsive layout that fits with existing dashboard
5. Brand consistency with existing red/black/yellow theme

2.details:
Implement the following:
1. PiP iframe for /broadcast view monitoring
2. Twitch API integration (viewer count, chat activity, follower count)
3. YouTube API integration (concurrent viewers, chat rate)
4. Real-time stats display with auto-refresh
5. Quick preview panel for queued videos/images
6. Draggable/resizable PiP window
7. Stats history tracking in Supabase
8. New database tables: stream_stats, platform_metrics

3.details:

3. Create deployment package ready for main repo integration
